# bs-alert



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description | Type                                                                                            | Default |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `class`       | `class`       | 样式文件        | `string`                                                                                        | `""`    |
| `dismissible` | `dismissible` | 是否显示关闭按钮    | `boolean`                                                                                       | `null`  |
| `message`     | `message`     | 消息内容        | `string`                                                                                        | `null`  |
| `showIcon`    | `show-icon`   | 显示一个图标      | `string`                                                                                        | `null`  |
| `type`        | `type`        | 弹窗类型        | `"danger" \| "dark" \| "info" \| "light" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `null`  |


## Events

| Event       | Description | Type                |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `bsOnClose` | 关闭事件        | `CustomEvent<void>` |
